DOC.brief_summary: The study prospective , randomise , control , non-blinded multi-center pilot study evaluate endocrine efficacy recombinant luteinizing hormone versus recombinant human chorionic gonadotropin administer controlled ovarian stimulation IVF/ICSI normogonadotrophic woman .
